div.span: PowerSchool is our Data Management System where we track attendance, contact information, and end of term grades. It is also where we print academic reports from and submit our data to the State of Michigan.
Schoology brings together the best K-12 learning management system with assessment management to improve student performance, foster collaboration, and personalize learning.

div.p: After hours in an emergency, call Security at 517.796.7620
